questions.numInvalidValue: The entered value is not a number or is not in the specified range.

MC.text: Please select one or more options.

generic.title: KlickerUZH
generic.loginError: The username or password are incorrect.
generic.systemError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
generic.question: Question

contentInput.boldStyle: Select this setting for bold text. The same can also be achieved with the standard keyboard shortcut cmd/ctrl+b.
contentInput.italicStyle: Select this setting for italic text. The same can also be achieved with the standard keyboard shortcut cmd/ctrl+i.
contentInput.codeStyle: Select this setting for code styling.
contentInput.citationStyle: Select this option to insert a citation. Please note that currently new paragraphs (by a line break / Enter) are displayed as separate citations.
contentInput.numberedList: This option creates a numbered list. To create new points, simply insert a new line after an existing element. To return to standard text, press this button again.
contentInput.unnumberedList: This option creates an unnumbered list. To create new points, simply insert a new line after an existing element. To return to standard text, press this button again.
contentInput.image: Select this setting to include an image. Use the same syntax to include formulas in answer options.
contentInput.latex: Select this setting to include an inline LaTeX formula. Use the same syntax to include formulas in answer options.
contentInput.latexCentered: Select this setting to include a LaTeX formula centered on a separate line.

leaderboard.noPointsCollected: No points have been collected in this session so far. As soon as this changes, podium and leaderboard will be displayed here.

error.pwaWithoutUser: Sorry, the page you requested does not exist. You can <login>sign in</login> to see an overview of all KlickerUZH elements your courses offer.
error.pwaWithUser: Sorry, the page you requested does not exist. View an <home>overview</home> of all KlickerUZH elements your courses offer.
error.offlineHint: You seem to be offline at the moment. Connect your device to the Internet to use the KlickerUZH app.

general.userNotLoggedIn: You are currently not logged in. <login>Please log in</login> if you want to collect points and XP and see an overview of your learning progress.

login.installAndroid: Install the KlickerUZH app on your phone to receive push notifications when new learning content is available.
login.installIOS: Open the Share dialog and click 'Add to Home Screen' to install the KlickerUZH app on your phone.

courses.individualLeaderboardUpdate: The individual leaderboard will be updated hourly.
courses.noGroups: No groups have been created yet. Let's go!
courses.noGroupPoints: No group points have been collected yet. Let's go!
courses.groupLeaderboardUpdate: The group leaderboard will be updated daily.xGroups with a single member will not receive any points.
courses.bookmarkedQuestionsDesc: This page allows you to repeat all questions with bookmarks from the course {courseName}. They will be displayed as a regular learning element.

joinCourse.title: Join Course "{name}"
joinCourse.introLoggedIn: You are already logged in and can join the course {name} directly by entering the correct PIN.
joinCourse.introLoggedInNoCourse: You are already logged in and can join a course directly by entering the corresponding PIN.
joinCourse.introNewUser: Create your KlickerUZH account for the course {name} here. If you already have an account, you can enter the corresponding login data directly in the form.
joinCourse.coursePinNumerical: Please enter a numerical course PIN.

learningElement.notFound: The corresponding learning element is either not available or not yet published.
learningElement.noRepetition: There are currently no learning elements available for repetition.
learningElement.orderLAST_RESPONSE: Order: last answered questions at the end
learningElement.solvedLearningElement: You have successfully completed the learning element <it>{name}</it>.
learningElement.questionTypeNotSupported: This question type is currently not available for learning elements
learningElement.flagQuestionText: This feedback form is intended to allow you to make a direct comment on the individual questions of a learning element / micro-session, should an error have crept in. The lecturer will receive a message with your feedback. Therefore, please try to describe the error as accurately as possible.
learningElement.feedbackRequired: Please add a text to your feedback.
learningElement.feedbackTransmitted: Your feedback has been transmitted successfully.

microSession.notFound: The corresponding micro session is either not available or not yet active.
microSession.solvedMicrolearning: You have successfully completed the microlearning <it>{name}</it>.

session.allQuestionsAnswered: You have already answered all active questions.

profile.isProfilePublic: Should your profile and pseudonym be displayed to other participants? If you deactivate this option, you will be displayed as Anonymous to other participants. Note that you will see all other participants as Anonymous as well.
profile.editProfileFailed: Unfortunately, an error occurred while saving the changes. The username you have chosen may already be taken. Please check your entries and try again.
profile.usernameMinLength: The username must be at least {length} characters long.
profile.usernameMaxLength: The username must not be longer than {length} characters.
profile.passwordMinLength: The password must be at least {length} characters long.
profile.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid e-mail address.
profile.welcomeMessage: Welcome to KlickerUZH! If this is your first time here, please set a password and define your own username and avatar.
profile.deleteProfileDescription: Deleting your KlickerUZH account will delete all associated data and prevent a new account from being created in your current browser.
profile.deleteProfileConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete your account? All data related to your account will be deleted. This action cannot be undone.

general.404Message: The page you requested does not exist. Please return to the <link>question pool</link> or use the main menu at the top for further navigation.
general.title: Title

login.installAndroid: Install the KlickerUZH Manage app on your phone to use certain functions for lecturers at any time.
login.installIOS: Open the Share dialog and click 'Add to Home Screen' to install the KlickerUZH Manage app on your phone.

token.tokenGenerationExplanation: On this page you can generate a token to log into the Klicker control app at <link>{displayLink}</link>. This token has a validity of 10 minutes, but can be regenerated at any time.
token.tokenExpired: Unfortunately, your token has expired, please generate a new one.

questionPool.noQuestionsWarning: We could not find any questions that meet the desired criteria. Please try other filters or create a new question.
questionPool.confirmDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete the following question(s)?
questionPool.noQuestionRecovery: This action cannot be undone. The question(s) will be permanently deleted and cannot be restored. Questions will not be removed from existing sessions.

tags.confirmTagDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete the following tag?
tags.tagDeletionHint: Deleted tags cannot be restored. All questions with this tag will remain, but the tag will be removed.
tags.validName: Please enter a valid name for your tag.

questionForms.titleTooltip: Enter a short, summary title for the question. This is only used for better overview.
questionForms.tagsTooltip: Add tags to your question to improve organization and reusability (similar to previous folders).
questionForms.tagFormatting: Temporarily required formatting: Enter tags separated by commas, e.g.: Tag1,Tag2,Tag3
questionForms.multiplierTooltip: Select a multiplier with which the points for this question should be multiplied. It can be chosen between 1 and 4.
questionForms.questionTooltip: Enter the question you want to ask the participants. The rich text editor allows you to use the following (block) formatting: bold text, italic text, code, quotes, numbered lists, unordered lists and LaTeX formulas. Hover over the individual buttons for more information.
questionForms.explanationTooltip: Enter a generic explanation of your question here, which will be displayed to students in learning elements and micro-sessions regardless of their answer as an explanation of the correct solution.
questionForms.answerOptionsTooltip: Enter the possible answers that students can select for the question here.
questionForms.FTOptionsTooltip: Enter optional settings for the free text question here.
questionForms.solutionRangesTooltip: Enter the intervals that should be considered correct here.

sessionForms.sessionName: Please enter a name for your session.
sessionForms.sessionDisplayName: Please enter a valid display name for your session.
sessionForms.considerFormErrors: Please check the form for error messages.
sessionForms.startDate: Please enter a start date for your session.
sessionForms.endDate: Please enter an end date for your session.
sessionForms.endAfterStart: The end date has to be later than the start date.
sessionForms.checkValues: Please check your entries in the previous step before proceeding.
sessionForms.name: Name
sessionForms.questionsDragDrop: Use drag and drop to add your questions here...
sessionForms.timeLimitTooltip: Time limit for block ${blockIx} in seconds
sessionForms.displayNameTooltip: Der Anzeigename wird den Teilnehmenden bei der Durchführung angezeigt.
sessionForms.microSessionTypes: Micro-sessions can only contain single choice, multiple choice, kprim and numerical questions.
sessionForms.microSessionCreated: Your micro-session {name} has been created successfully.
sessionForms.microSessionEdited: Your micro-session {name} has been edited successfully.
sessionForms.microSessionDescription: In this step, enter the name and description of the micro-session.
sessionForms.microSessionSettings: In this step, select the start and end date and make further settings.
sessionForms.microSessionQuestions: In this step, select the questions for the micro-session.
sessionForms.microSessionName: This name should allow you to distinguish this micro session from others. It will not be shown to the participants, please use the display name (next field) for this.
sessionForms.microSessionDescField: Add a description to your micro-session that will be displayed to participants at the beginning.
sessionForms.microSessionCourse: For the creation of a micro session, the selection of the corresponding course is required.
sessionForms.microSessionStartDate: Please choose the start date of the micro session. The session will be displayed to the participants from this point in time.
sessionForms.microSessionEndDate: Please choose the end date of the micro session. The session will no longer be displayed to the participants after this point in time.
sessionForms.microSessionMultiplier: The multiplier is a factor with which the points of the participants are multiplied in a gamified micro session.
sessionForms.liveSessionGamified: Please specify, if the session should be gamified
sessionForms.liveSessionTypes: Live sessions can only contain single choice, multiple choice, numerical and free text questions.
sessionForms.liveSessionTimeRestriction: Please enter a valid time restriction.
sessionForms.liveSessionDescription: In this step, enter the name and description of the live session.
sessionForms.liveSessionSettings: In this step, you can make settings for the session.
sessionForms.liveSessionDragDrop: Use drag&drop on the plus icon to add questions to your blocks. New blocks can be created either by drag&drop on the corresponding field or by clicking on the button.
sessionForms.liveSessionName: The name should allow you to distinguish this session from others. It will not be shown to the participants, please use the display name (next field) for this.
sessionForms.liveSessionDescField: Here you can enter an optional description of the live session. This will be displayed to the students at the beginning of the session.
sessionForms.liveSessionCourse: You can assign your session to a course.
sessionForms.liveSessionMultiplier: The multiplier is a factor with which the points are multiplied when a question is answered. The factor is only used if gamification is activated.
sessionForms.liveSessionGamification: Specify whether gamification should be enabled for this session. Gamified sessions should only be used for gamified courses.
sessionForms.learningElementResetDays: Please enter a number of days after which the learning element can be repeated.
sessionForms.learningElementValidResetDays: Please enter a valid number of days after which the learning element can be repeated.
sessionForms.learningElementTypes: Learning elements can only contain single choice, multiple choice, Kprim and numerical questions.
sessionForms.learningElementSolutionReq: Please only add questions with solution.
sessionForms.learningElementDescription: In this step, enter the name and description of the learning element.
sessionForms.learningElementSettings: In this step, make settings for your learning element.
sessionForms.learningElementContent: In this step, add questions and text elements to your learning element.
sessionForms.learningElementName: The name should allow you to distinguish this learning element from others. It will not be shown to the participants, please use the display name (next field) for this.
sessionForms.learningElementDescField: Add a description to your learning element that will be displayed to participants at the beginning.
sessionForms.learningElementSelectCourse: For the creation of a learning element, the selection of the corresponding course is required.
sessionForms.learningElementMultiplier: Select a multiplier. All points that students collect in this learning element will be multiplied by the multiplier.
sessionForms.learningElementRepetition: Select a period after which students can repeat the learning element.
sessionForms.learningElementOrder: Select an order in which the questions are to be solved by the students.

formErrors.resolveErrors: Please ensure that the following errors in the form are resolved before saving the question:
formErrors.questionName: Please enter a name for the question.
formErrors.questionContent: Please add some content to your question.
formErrors.attachmentURL: Please enter a valid URL for the attachment.
formErrors.attachmentName: Please enter a name for the attachment.
formErrors.answerContent: Please add some content to your answer option.
formErrors.feedbackContent: Please add some content to your answer feedback.
formErrors.SCAnswersCorrect: For SC questions exactly one answer has to be marked as correct.
formErrors.MCAnswersCorrect: For MC questions at least one answer has to be marked as correct.
formErrors.FTMaxLength: The maximum length of a free text question response has to be at least 1.
formErrors.solutionRequired: Please enter at least one solution of deactivate the sample solution.
formErrors.NRPrecision: The number of decimal places must be at least 0.
formErrors.solutionRangeRequired: Please enter at least one valid solution range.

sessions.confirmLiveSessionDeletion: Are you sure you want to delete the following live session?
sessions.liveSessionDeletionHint: Deleting a live session is only possible as long as it has not been started. Deleted live sessions cannot be restored at a later date.
sessions.evaluationLinksEmbedding: Evaluation links for embedding in PowerPoint

cockpit.confirmAbortSession: Are you sure you want to abort the following session?
cockpit.abortSessionHint: When aborting a session, the session is reset so that it can be started again from the beginning at a later date. Please note that all previous answers, feedbacks, etc. will be lost.
cockpit.noFeedbackFilterMatch: No feedbacks match the current filter settings...
cockpit.confusionSpeedTooltip: The display below illustrates the aggregated feedback of the students regarding the currently perceived speed of the lecture.
cockpit.confusionDifficultyTooltip: The display below illustrates the aggregated feedback of the students regarding the currently perceived difficulty of the content being taught.

evaluation.evaluationNotYetAvailable: The evaluation for this question cannot be displayed yet. If you want to embed this page somewhere, e.g. via the PowerPoint plugin, the evaluation will be displayed automatically after starting the question.
evaluation.noSignedInStudents: So far, no participants were signed in during this session and collected points.
evaluation.noFeedbacksYet: This session does not contain any feedbacks yet.
evaluation.noConfusionFeedbacksYet: This session does not contain any confusion feedbacks yet.
evaluation.noChartsAvailable: There exists no chart for this question type yet
evaluation.noFeedbacksMatchFilter: No feedbacks match the current filter settings...
evaluation.minStep60s: The step size must be at least 60 seconds.
evaluation.validMinSteps: Please enter a valid minimum step size.
evaluation.minWindowLength: The window length must be at least 1.
evaluation.validWindowLength: Please enter a valid window length.
evaluation.confusionDiagramsTooltip: The diagrams below show all confusion feedbacks of the participants from the beginning to the end of the Klicker session. The values are normalized to the interval [-1,1] and set to 0 if no values are available in a time interval. The exact number of feedbacks can be read out by hovering the mouse over a data point.
evaluation.timestepXTooltip: In this field, the step size on the x-axis in seconds for the diagrams can be entered. The minimum value is 60 seconds, the default value is 120 seconds.
evaluation.windowLengthTooltip: In this field, a custom factor (multiplied by the step size on the x-axis) for the size of the running window for the average calculation can be set. The smallest possible factor is 1, the default value is 3.

lecturer.audienceInteractionNotActivated: Audience interaction has not been activated.
lecturer.noFeedbacks: No feedbacks received or pinned yet...

courseList.courseNameReq: Please enter a name for the course.
courseList.courseDisplayNameReq: Please enter a display name for the course.
courseList.courseColorReq: Please select a color for the course.
courseList.courseStartReq: Please enter a start date for your course. The dates can be changed after creating the course.
courseList.courseEndReq: Please enter an end date for your course. The dates can be changed after creating the course.
courseList.endDateFuture: The end date must be in the future.
courseList.endAfterStart: The end date must be after the start date.
courseList.courseNameTooltip: The course name is used for identification purposes. Students will not see this name.
courseList.courseDisplayNameTooltip: The display name is shown to students. It can differ from the course name.
courseList.courseDescriptionTooltip: The description is shown to students. You can use it to describe the goals of the course.
courseList.startDateTooltip: After the start date, students can access the course's content. The start date can be changed after creating the course.
courseList.endDateTooltip: After the end date, the course will be shown as archived to students, but they can still access the content. The end date can be changed after creating the course.

course.requiredPin: The PIN required to join is: {pin}
course.dateChangeFailed: An error occurred while adjusting the date. Please check the input.
course.linkMicroSessionCopied: The link to the micro-session has been successfully copied to the clipboard.
course.linkLearningElementCopied: The link to the learning element has been successfully copied to the clipboard.
course.confirmPublishing: Are you sure you want to publish the following item?
course.publishingHint: Publishing a learning element or micro-session makes the item visible to all participants. This process cannot be undone. Changes to the content of an item cannot be made after publishing.
course.microPublishingHint: Micro-sessions are additionally only visible within the specified date range.
course.confirmDeletionMicroSession: Are you sure you want to delete the following micro-session?
course.hintDeletionMicroSession: Deleting a micro-session is only possible as long as it is not running and is used in a course. Deleted micro-sessions cannot be restored at a later date.
course.confirmDeletionLearningElement: Are you sure you want to delete the following learning element?
course.hintDeletionLearningElement: Deleting a learning element is only possible as long as it is not used in an active course. Deleted learning elements cannot be restored at a later date.

login.installAndroid: Install the KlickerUZH Controller app on your phone to control your sessions directly from your smartphone during lectures.
login.installIOS: Open the share dialog and click 'Add to Home Screen' to install the KlickerUZH Controller app on your phone and control live sessions directly.

home.errorLoadingCourse: An error occurred while loading your courses. Please try again later.
home.listSessionsNoCourse: List of all sessions without course

course.loadingFailed: An error occurred while loading your courses. Please try again later.
course.completedSessionsHint: Completed sessions can be viewed with results on the corresponding page in the KlickerUZH management app.
course.sessionStartFailed: Unfortunately, your session could not be started due to an error. Please try again later.
course.confirmStartSession: Are you sure you want to start the following session?
course.explanationStartSession: Please note that a started live session is generally publicly accessible. Running sessions can be canceled or stopped using the KlickerUZH management app.

session.errorLoadingSession: Unfortunately, an error occurred while loading the session. Please make sure that the session is still running or try again later.
session.containsNoQuestions: This session does not contain any questions and therefore cannot be controlled via the controller app at the moment. Please use the management app with all functionalities.
session.hintAllBlocksClosed: All blocks of this session have already been executed and closed. The feedback channel will be closed when the session is ended.
session.hintLastBlock: The currently running block is the last of this session. After closing it, the session can be ended.
